thread.title: Spend less time deploying clusters and more time on innovation
thread.title_full: Spend less time deploying clusters and more time on innovation

author: admin
title: Spend less time deploying clusters and more time on innovation
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 9:12 AM   Principled Technologies 
DURHAM, NC--(Marketwired - October 12, 2015) - Faster, simpler deployment means your IT administrators can devote more energy to other important datacenter projects. Principled Technologies (PT) evaluated the speed and simplicity of service deployment with Dell Active System Manager (ASM) and an HP OneView solution. PT found that Dell ASM was faster and took far fewer steps to deploy services than the HP OneView solution. 
To learn more about Dell Active System Manager, read the report at facts.pt/1PkM34y and see the infographic at facts.pt/1WO8j42 . 
About Principled Technologies, Inc. 
Principled Technologies, Inc. is the leading provider of technology marketing and learning & development services. 
Principled Technologies, Inc. is located in Durham, North Carolina, USA. For more information, please visit www.principledtechnologies.com .
